Field Detail

agentProxyID

private AgentProxyID agentProxyID
The proxy id of this agent proxy. It must be unique along the platform.

Constructor Detail

AgentProxy

public AgentProxy()
Method Detail

update

public abstract AgentProxy update()
This method is called every time that the owner of a proxy requires an update on the proxy itself. What this method does is to return a new instance of the proxy with the same status the proxy is at that moment. In other words, each time this method is called, and the proxy has been manipulated by the role engine, this method must return a new instance of the agent proxy with the manipulation done and the status at the same point in time of when the method has been called. The adoption of this clone-approach simplifies the instantiation of a new manipulated proxy when required. Please note that this method could provide a critical section, since the method could be called while the proxy is changing and the owner of the proxy could still get the old (not manipulated) instance of the proxy. It is strongly raccomended to provide an hidden clone mechanism of the proxy and to store the prototype of the proxy within the proxy itself.

Returns:
the update proxy

getAgentProxyID

public final AgentProxyID getAgentProxyID()
Provides the identification of this proxy.

Returns:
the agent proxy id.

initializeByCopy

public void initializeByCopy(AgentProxy proxy)
This method copies the agent proxy id. Even if this method could be overriden, it should always be called from subclasses in order to ensure the copy of the proxy id in the current (i.e., manipulated) proxy.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy from which the id must be copied from.

addEventListener

public final boolean addEventListener(EventListener listener)
Attaches an event listener to changes related to this proxy.

Parameters:
listener - the listener that will be notified about changes applied to this proxy
Returns:
true if the listener has been added

removeEventListener

public final boolean removeEventListener(EventListener listener)
Removes the specified event listener from the list of listeners notified by changes applied on this proxy.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be removed
Returns:
true if the listener has been removed, false if not (e.g., the listener has not been attached to this proxy before).
